org.jacp.api.component
Interface IRootComponent<T,A>

Type Parameters:
T - component type to register
A - action type to use in registration process
All Known Subinterfaces:
IPerspective<L,A,M>
public interface IRootComponent<T,A>

All root components have containing sub components (workspace -> perspectives; perspective - editors) and listeners; all sub components have to be initialized, registered and handled

Author:
Andy Moncsek

Method Summary
 IComponentHandler<T,A> getComponentHandler()
          Returns component handler to handle initialization and reassignment of subcomponents.
 void initComponents(A action)
          Handles initialization of subcomponents.
 void registerComponent(T component)
          Register the component at the listener.
 void unregisterComponent(T component)
          Unregister component from current perspective.
